ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/WAEzk68.png[/img] Update of Neronix17s mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1567775191
- The robes and hood will now be considered cultist-clothing if using [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2249174783]Call of Cthulhu - Cults[/url] - Removed dependencies since the mod never got content that required them
[img]https://i.imgur.com/7Gzt3Rg.png[/img]
[table] [tr] [td][url=https://invite.gg/Mlie][img]https://i.imgur.com/zdzzBrc.png[/img][/url][/td] [td][url=https://github.com/emipa606/O21Thaumrim][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url][/td] [/tr] [/table]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/NOW7jU1.png[/img] [b]Plans have been cut for this. I'm cutting back on a lot of plans in terms of Rimworld mods and this is one of the ones I've decided to cut. Sorry to those who've been waiting for the updates.[/b]
Thaumcraft (a veteran Minecraft mod by Azanor) introduced to the Rimworld universe.
[b]Currently Includes:[/b] [list][*]Crimson Cult Robes [*]Crimson Knight Armour[/list]
[b]Future Plans:[/b] [list][*]Crimson Cult Faction and equipment, including buildings [*]Thaumaturgy, various spells and abilities to be researched and unlocked. [*]Essentia system [*]Vis system powering Thaumaturgical magics. [*]Loads of apparel and items. [*]Golems [*]Enemies other than the Crimson Cult [*]Events for said enemies and various other things.[/list]
[h1][b]1.0 Load Order (1.1 handles it automatically):[/b][/h1] [list][*]Core [*]HugsLib [*]JecsTools[/list]
[b]Credit:[/b] [list][*]Neronix17 - As of latest version created everything in the mod not otherwise credited. [*]Jecrell - Apparel Shader to allow textures on crafted items to not be tainted by the colouring of the materials used. [*]Azanor - creator of Thaumcraft, the original mod for Minecraft this is based on.[/list]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Rs6T6cr.png[/img] [list] [*] See if the the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active. [*] If not, try adding your other mods until it happens again. [*] Post your error-log using [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=818773962]HugsLib[/url] and command Ctrl+F12 [*] For best support, please use the Discord-channel for error-reporting. [*] Do not report errors by making a discussion-thread, I get no notification of that. [*] If you have the solution for a problem, please post it to the GitHub repository. [/list]
